subject: Re: [junit] GUI Component
msgSnippet: ... As far as I can tell, GUIs for JUnit have been left to the IDE providers. Can you let us know more about your situation if you aren t able to use one of
messageBody:
2009/7/6 Arnaud Bailly <arnaud.oqube@...>:
>
>
> Hello,
> There is no more any GUI shipping with JUnit 4, at least that I am
> aware of. Does there exist somewhere a GUI component (ideally a JPanel
> :-)) that could be integrated easily ?
>
> Thanks
> Arnaud

As far as I can tell, GUIs for JUnit have been left to the IDE
providers. Can you let us know more about your situation if you aren't
able to use one of these?

Cheers,

James
